QuestData.Title: But First My Offspring
QuestData.Description: I am the last of the gods to be subdued, so we must first attempt to free the others. Bound by the magics of my subduers, I am unable to discern their fates.$B$BBut first, I would ask that you do me a kindness. Already the Drakkari turn my magic against me. They have transformed my offspring into monstrosities.$B$BTake one of my whiskers. Slay my tortured children and use the magic of it to release them from their nightmare, and bring them back to life.
QuestData.LogDescription: Har'koa has asked you to use her whisker on the corpses of her children to free and resurrect them. Return to her at the Altar of Har'koa when you are done.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are more of my offspring that you must free from their torment!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. I will never forget what you have done.
